meta.name: 矽谷流萬用敘事簡報法則
meta.source: 矽谷流萬用敘事簡報法則 - 博客來電子書
meta.description: 將死書本變成能執行的書本，輔導人們用矽谷流原則做簡報

core_framework.name: 故事四大路標
core_framework.description: 任何好故事都有 WHY、WHAT、HOW 的完整結構

components.name: 背景
components.description: 設定場景，報告上次之後完成了哪些事

components.name: 衝突
components.description: 找出正在影響專案或計畫的挑戰

WHAT.label: 大創意
WHAT.description: 核心訊息，推動進展的標題，用金句表達

components.name: 結局
components.description: 提供建議的細節，行動呼籲

presentation_types.name: 提出建議
presentation_types.description: 當需要提出解決方案或新計畫時使用

slide_sequence.title: 背景與衝突
slide_sequence.prompt_template: Corporate presentation slide showing: Background context on the left (showing current situation), and conflict/challenge on the right. Use blue and orange accent colors. Professional, clean design with clear visual hierarchy. Topic: {topic}

slide_sequence.title: 人物與利害關係人
slide_sequence.prompt_template: Corporate presentation slide showcasing key stakeholders and their roles. Use professional headshot style illustrations or icons. Clean layout with names and roles clearly labeled. Topic: {topic}

slide_sequence.title: 大創意
slide_sequence.prompt_template: Impactful corporate presentation slide with ONE bold headline/statement in the center. Minimalist design with dramatic typography. This is the core message. Use contrasting colors for emphasis. Topic: {topic}

slide_sequence.title: 解決方案
slide_sequence.prompt_template: Corporate presentation slide showing 3 solution pillars or approaches in a row. Each pillar has an icon and brief description. Professional infographic style. Topic: {topic}

slide_sequence.title: 結局與行動呼籲
slide_sequence.prompt_template: Corporate presentation slide with call to action. Show expected results with data visualization (charts/graphs) and next steps. Professional, inspiring design. Topic: {topic}

presentation_types.name: 近況更新
presentation_types.description: 當需要報告專案進度或近況時使用

slide_sequence.title: 進度總覽
slide_sequence.prompt_template: Corporate status update slide showing progress dashboard. Include timeline or Gantt-style progress bar, key milestones achieved. Professional data visualization. Topic: {topic}

slide_sequence.title: 已完成項目
slide_sequence.prompt_template: Corporate presentation slide listing completed achievements with checkmark icons. Clean, organized layout. Show what was accomplished since last update. Topic: {topic}

slide_sequence.title: 挑戰與風險
slide_sequence.prompt_template: Corporate presentation slide showing current challenges or risks. Use warning indicators and risk matrix style. Professional risk assessment visual. Topic: {topic}

slide_sequence.title: 下一步計畫
slide_sequence.prompt_template: Corporate presentation slide with upcoming milestones and action items. Timeline or roadmap style with clear deadlines. Professional project planning visual. Topic: {topic}

presentation_types.name: 創業簡報
presentation_types.description: 向投資人或利害關係人做簡報時使用

slide_sequence.title: 問題陳述
slide_sequence.prompt_template: Pitch deck slide dramatically illustrating the problem being solved. Show pain points visually. Dark/moody colors with accent color for emphasis. Startup presentation style. Topic: {topic}

slide_sequence.title: 解決方案
slide_sequence.prompt_template: Pitch deck slide showcasing the product/solution as the hero. Clean product visualization or app mockup. Bright, optimistic design. Startup presentation style. Topic: {topic}

slide_sequence.title: 市場機會
slide_sequence.prompt_template: Pitch deck slide showing market size and opportunity. TAM/SAM/SOM visualization or market growth charts. Data-driven startup presentation style. Topic: {topic}

slide_sequence.title: 成績與實績
slide_sequence.prompt_template: Pitch deck slide displaying key metrics, user growth, or achievements. Hockey stick growth chart, key numbers highlighted. Startup metrics dashboard style. Topic: {topic}

slide_sequence.title: 募資需求
slide_sequence.prompt_template: Pitch deck slide with clear funding ask and use of funds. Pie chart showing fund allocation, key terms highlighted. Professional investment presentation style. Topic: {topic}

story_rules.name: 不要傾倒數據
story_rules.description: 數據複雜時不能助故事一臂之力，圖表要有故事線

story_rules.name: 衝突要明確
story_rules.description: 衝突要晚一點出場，從頭到尾沒明確解釋是外部問題

story_rules.name: 背景先行
story_rules.description: 人物與背景不能蓋住，要在開場建立脈絡意義

story_rules.name: 大創意推動故事
story_rules.description: 大創意要能推動故事向前，不能是籠統標題

story_rules.name: 視覺專業
story_rules.description: 視覺呈現要專業，有策略，能助故事一臂之力

visual_guidelines: 使用藍色和橘色作為主要配色
每張投影片只有一個核心訊息
數據視覺化要有故事線

prompt_engineering.base_style: Professional corporate presentation slide, clean modern design, 16:9 aspect ratio
prompt_engineering.color_palette: Blue (#0066CC) and orange (#FF6600) accent colors on white background
prompt_engineering.typography: Bold headlines, clear hierarchy, minimal text
prompt_engineering.quality_tags: High quality, professional, business presentation, clean layout, infographic style
